Set.Text: Gain 5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production per city equally divided amongst cities that follow your [ICON_RELIGION] Religion. [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections yield 5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Gain +5 [ICON_PEACE] Faith per [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route and [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes spread [ICON_RELIGION] religion twice as fast.
